data.title: Authors · Econ Journal Watch
data.meta_description: A listing of the authors of EJW.…
data.text: Econ Journal Watch fills a gaping hole. The fact that so few academic journals encourage comments about the articles they publish is unfortunate. EJW is a vital check on error and ideally would publish at least ten times as many comments and articles as it currently does. Every academic discipline should have its own version of this vital resource — a History Journal Watch, a Sociology Journal Watch, a Psychology Journal Watch, etc.
